page.title: 13The Transit Camp
page.content: At first it didn't seem to us that there was much local{industry}until we went to look at the transit camp.At first we found out that it got it's name,because it was used as a base or{ {barracks}for troops in transit to,or from the continent. Now it is used for a range of purposes ;at least 10 companies are based there dealing with trailers and containers,used in the{export and {import}business.We tried to find out what they dealt with,but we were told that it was not wise to tell us for security reasons;the camp is fenced and well gaurded. In addition there were 4 firms which were in car repairs,2 in marine building,and also Autoprint.They were kind enough to give us a tour,they deal with all sorts of printing,and are now beginning to print books.
